title: Question 10
prompt:
Sentence 3: That’s four too five pounds of trash per person each day.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of the sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The word “too” can mean “also,” as in, “I want to go, too,” or an excessive amount, as in “I ate too much ice cream.” Neither definition of “too” works in this sentence.

That’s four also five pound… Wrong!
That’s four an excessive amount of five pounds… Wrong!

“To” is used to mean an amount between two numbers or a time between two dates. The correct word is “to.”



That’s four to five pounds…



That’s a number between four and five pounds… Right!
